Valve has been secretly paying developers for years to build tech that could make Windows irrelevant for gaming. I tested it on a phone and honestly...this is wild. Microsoft might have a big problem.

0:00 The Secret in Plain View
2:50 A Little (Red) Magic
5:25 How it Works

10:19 Microsoft Wakes Up
13:03 The Future
title: Valve's SECRET Plan to End Windows
